short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unofficial new tab page to display a Readwise highlight and its related information. Delete, modify and view more highlights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No one uses the search bar in the new tab, so why not show something more useful ;)

Features:
- Dark Mode
- Delete highlights
- Modify highlights and notes
- View Source and Author in Details Page
- View new highlights

Have any questions? Tweet at me https://twitter.com/johnmavrick_yt
Want to contribute? Clone the repo https://github.com/ransurf/readwise-new-tab-highlight
Want to support me? Buy me a coffee https://ko-fi.com/johnmavrick
